question: What was the route of the first flight service under UDAN scheme?
explanation: Ude Desh ka Aam Nagrik (UDAN) scheme was launched in 2017. The purpose of this scheme is to make flying an affordable experience for the citizens by building new airports, introducing new routes and decreasing air fare. Under UDAN scheme, the first fight flew operated by Air India from Shimla - Delhi on April 2017. It was started by our Prime Minister Shri. Narendra Modi.
